entry.title: Combined summary - Berlin Bitcoin Hackathon
entry.summary: A Bitcoin hackathon event is currently taking place in Berlin, as announced by the speaker of this statement. More information about the event can be found on the website http://bitcoin-hackathon.com/. The speaker has also offered to provide hosting space if needed.The event was initially shared on the Bitcoin-development mailing list by Amir Taaki on June 22, 2012. He expressed his willingness to host the event if space was required and mentioned that it would discuss the changing security and threat landscape and how IT managers could respond. Discussions at the event included endpoint security, mobile security, and the latest malware threats.Mike Hearn responded to the email, confirming that he had booked flights and would attend the hackathon with Amir Taaki. The link provided in the email contained further details about the event.
